divs: Sighting Detailslive in nassau county, long island. this ball of light was huge, a very distinct orange glow to it. If you were outside in my area, it will be reported by others. It was a once in a lifetime sighting. could have been a meteor, not sure. I was so shocked and confused as to what i was looking at, and it lasted for a very long time. Outstanding....
trends: There have been 5 other sightings in Massapequa
There was one other sighting in Massapequa on or around December 26th 2011
